website_summaries.verdict: The most cost-efficient choice and still has convenient features with strong reliability.
pros: See your data usage and manage your devices
Connects up to 10 devices at a time, making it useful for families
With 4G LTE and dual-band WiFi, you get a strong connection almost anywhere
cons: Works on a pre-paid service, which might not be ideal for all users

customer_reviews.title: It's sold as unlocked but it's locked!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was sold as unlocked but it's locked. I tried to turn on with a T-mobile sim card and appears clearly that the sim is locked. What should I do?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: We live in the country with no wifi access. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: AT&T Order Status Sat, 5/12/18 This device is flagged ...
customer_reviews.text: AT&T Order Status Sat, 5/12/18 This device is flagged for fraud We can't unlock this device. Device IMEI number: 8 This is the message I received from Att. One it was supposed to be unlocked and when it wasn't asked to have it unlocked and this the message I received. People please be aware so you don't get ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works with Cricket!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, simple product. I took it to Cricket and had no issues using it as a Wi-Fi hotspot on crickets network, which, I believe, simply piggybacks off AT&T.
customer_reviews.author: achribald van zeta

customer_reviews.title: ZTE is known to have major problems
customer_reviews.text: Worked for five minutes then continues to completely shut down. I have it set on “always on, never sleep” WiFi mode, but this device, just completely shuts down, goes black. I have to reboot by holding the on/off button for ten seconds to get it to come back on, it does and then lasts five minutes. Junk product. Returning today.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great on AT&T in the US
customer_reviews.text: I first tried the Huawei E5573Cs-609 and it didn't work, but this hotspot worked great on AT&T in the US. You can tell this is a quality made product as soon as you see it. I liked the on-screen management (nice crisp display) rather than having to connect to the HTML management facility. Reception is good. Battery life is really good, though the only reason I gave this a 4 star rating was because when charging the device automatically turns itself on (I did not want to it to be draining data at night when I charged).
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: AT&T won't UNLOCK due to FRAUD
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this with description saying need to call service provider (to register if not AT&T) implying should work with T-Mobile. When configuring message on device web page says NOT UNLOCKED and to contact service provider to unlock. I Go to AT&Ts unlock website and input IMEI and wait for unlock code but instead I get "This Device is Reported as Fraud Unable to Unlock" will return in 2 days without solution will update!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl I Pruss

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Performer
customer_reviews.text: This device worked well in an AT&T only remote location and this device worked well for data connectivity on my laptop and cell phone. However, VOIP was spotty in that I could receive well but the distant end had trouble hearing me. This was the same for others with different devices as well. We solved that problem with AT&T Pre-Paid phones with $35 per month plans.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Coleman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No this didn't meet my expectations. It is not unlocked.You can only use on AT&T. Not what I expected.....
customer_reviews.author: Lovely

customer_reviews.title: NOT UNLOCKED as described. Will avoid seller in the future.
customer_reviews.text: Device did not work as described. Placed SIM and it did not work SIM LOCK error came up on the Device Screen. Attempted to contact Seller (Stahrr) and was given a notice to wait up to 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Moses

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Insert SIM card and ready to roll. Perfect for home and the road
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: AT & T Hot Spot
customer_reviews.text: Great price, fast delivery. Using this for secure internet when we travel in our RV. Most campgrounds have public WIFI - not secure for banking or email. So far works great.
customer_reviews.author: bkschertz

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me across 3 networks. Mine was in fact new and unlocked. The seller is named "used-gadgets" so I'm not sure why people are complaining about getting a used gadget. Paying a little bit of attention before hitting "buy now" saves a lot of headache.
customer_reviews.author: Unit562

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, not the worst hotspot.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hotspot for 4 days now, with the AT&T unlimited plan for $35 a month, and I’ve noticed some issues with it. The WiFi does cut out a lot, which is annoying, but the fix is to unplug it, then plug it in when the battery gets low. Then unplug it again when it’s at %100. It’s a big issuse and I hope a software update fixes it. It may be my device only, but I’m not for certain. You might want to steer clear from this one just to be safe and have minimal issues.
customer_reviews.author: UrAverageReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy one, they're dope.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I can have internet on the go so I can work in my car. Great for if you have multiple children, to keep their tablets connected on a road trip. Also helps with your social life, your friends will always want you to hang out, and people will be sad whenever you leave! It works with those eBay unlimited data plans (if you don't know what I'm talking about go look it up, it will change your life. You're welcome.) Took a couple extra days to get here, but it came through UPS I anticipated that. I would recommend this product to anyone who likes WiFi.
customer_reviews.author: isaac

customer_reviews.title: Extremely portable.
customer_reviews.text: Does just as it is supposed to do. All the kids can connect their tablets to wifi in the car. Keeps em quiet and that's a plus for me. Data speeds are entirely dependant upon your location from towers and signal strength and network congestion so most of the time it's great. Every now and then things can slow way down though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi T.

customer_reviews.title: FRAUDULENTLY LISTED AS UNLOCKED!
customer_reviews.text: NOT UNLOCKED. Unfortunatly I did not discover this until it is to late to return it. Tried switching carriers and it is locked. Flat out FRAUD saying it is unlocked when it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected to use this for work and add it to my existing AT&T Service. But no luck. Received this item and it's a prepaid device, but that information was not included in the description. Now I have to return it and order another device.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Dove

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a SIM card from a tablet in mine and it gives me unlimited WiFi. It says limited to 10 devices but if you are going to do much do not add video cameras or it over loads it and kicks you off. I moved it to my office with one computer, a priter, and an echo that I stream audio on and it works great, even when I have zoom calls on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: ABJD Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the item during the California Wildfires. Figured a hotspot would be helpful. Even purchased a compatible simcard. It recognized the sim, but did not allow access to the data. After a day of frustration I put the sim in an older cellphone and used that for the hotspot. Basically it was useless. I now have a paperweight sitting on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reid Garcia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Is not unlocked, only works with AT&T. Tried to get it unlocked with the vender but had no response
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: This hotspot was not unlocked
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was supposed to be unlocked. When I received it there was an ATT GoPhone card installed. When I inserted my Impact Wireless SIM card it would boot to a SIM Lock screen. This does me no good at all, as I would need to have an ATT account and phone number to do anything with it. If the device is advertized as being unlocked, then it should be unlocked and not locked into ATT's GoPhone prepaid.
customer_reviews.author: David Ogborn

customer_reviews.title: Way to go for wifi calling in bad service areas
customer_reviews.text: Use this at area with spotty service. Place where service is good, enable wifi calling on phones & great service!!! Thisnis my 2nd one. 1st one lasted 3yrs of constant use!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Jurgens

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a WiFiRanger router
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my RV as my primary hot spot, and I tether it to a WiFiRanger router via USB. In the past I haven't had good luck with USB tethering devices, iPhone and Android phones just don't work well in this capacity. However, the drivers for this hot spot seem very stable. We're also in a location where there is only 1 bar of AT&T and it's working well even without a booster.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: SMALL AND AFFORDABLE
customer_reviews.text: For a1st gen. It works very good. Even in a low coverage area was still able to have enough bandwidth speed to complete my tasks.
customer_reviews.author: G300

customer_reviews.title: NOT UNLOCKED!
customer_reviews.text: Typical cell industry marketing BS and run around. AT&T refused to "unlock" the "Unlocked" hotspot. Reason, "...related to fraud..." Buyer beware. Going back to Amazon. Amazon, might want to pay attention to their third parties. Vendor suggested I buy an AT&T sim card to unlock my "unlocked" hotspot. No thanks. That was the reason I ordered an "unlocked" device. DUH!
customer_reviews.author: Frederick L Williams

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a month and a half and it’s already having issues. I have it on the charger all day because it won’t seem to hold a charge (you can have it on there all day and it’s not at 100%). Now the screen glitches & it won’t charge up at all or turn on. It says it’s charging but isn’t. I’m not sure why these things have to be so expensive for how long they last/what they do. I have a netgear nighthawk that only lasted a year and a half for $200! Now this.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Evans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect transaction! We've used this product for several weeks and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ColdFireChief

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Shuts down constantly. Difficult to activate since you need internet to activate it anyway. Missed amazon return window because we didn’t need it right away. Purchased as described new but seal was broken and shows signs of use. No SIM included in packaging like new unit.
customer_reviews.author: BradFoxUS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second ZTE Velocity that I currently own and use. So, yes, I would buy this again. Easy to set up. Easy to use. (You don't really have to do anything except type in the displayed name and password into your computer) It works great, and allows me WiFi wherever I go. Utilizes Cricket/AT&T wireless, so you'll need to get set up with some kind of data plan with them. Once you have that, you're up and running in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Popped my sim card in from AT&T data only plan, and it worked immediately. Does not have great range, but works for a smaller home or apartment. Medium speed, 15-25 mgps, but that is because of where I live. I get closer to 50 in other locations.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G.

customer_reviews.title: velocity works well
customer_reviews.text: No problem with the velocity hotspot. Worked well. but I should have listened to others saying it does not work on my plan. I have an old unlimited plan and even though I called ATT to make sure it could be added to my unlimited plan, which they said it could, it could not be added to my old unlimited plan. I had to get a new plan just for this. smallest plan we 4gb for $45. Went through that and an additional 4gbs the first day. Had to cancel plan and return device. But the Velocity hotspot worked great. I have one on my plan that I have had for years and it is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Best hotspot device
customer_reviews.text: Pros:Unlocked, Carrier independent, Simple plug and play!! Cons: Havent found any as of now. This device is very handy if you cannot use your cellphone as a mobile hotspot. I have unlimited data plan for my cellular network. So, I cannot use my phone as a hotspot device. I purchased an extra SIM CARD as an additional line and used that SIM card on this device. There you go! I now have my mobile hotspot! As soon as I installed the SIM and restarted this device, my hotspot is ready! I now don't need to look for nearest Starbucks any more for free wifi ;)
customer_reviews.author: YS_HTX

customer_reviews.title: Sold me a display unit
customer_reviews.text: The unit looked normal when I opened it. But when I went to put the battery in, I noticed it said "display unit only. Not for sale." The item description did not mention that at all. Display units are not manufactured to the same level of quality control as units for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay W

customer_reviews.title: The unit was not unlocked as was said I my ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit was not unlocked as was said I my nephew had to pay $25 in Dominican republic to unlock it
customer_reviews.author: Steven R

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 6 months (regular use at home only) and then just quit working. Company won't replace it. Order from someone else if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Steph Tomte

customer_reviews.title: When You Buy Cheap You Get Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is just a couple year old pocket modem. Even with tweaking with the right card still could not deliver compared to 3g. I figure though for some it may be what they need so i said my piece and will keep it moving.
customer_reviews.author: Justice Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: For emergency only.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for temporary use when the power goes out. My laptop can access the internet with it. It's set up and ready to go, inside my laptop bag. With two extra power banks for extended power outages.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T. Sr.

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 10 in relation to the dozen or so other hotspot devices I've used at my house
customer_reviews.text: Dropped connections often on my cellphones but not so much with my fire sticks. Shuts off our of nowhere several times a day. Repeated having trouble connecting to the internet but not to the device.
customer_reviews.author: ssWARCRIME

customer_reviews.title: Was NOT unlocked
customer_reviews.text: While the product itself seemed in good condition, it is clearly not in an unlocked state. After transferring a simcard that was working in exact same device that was unlocked device, the device I received did NOT recognize the SIM card.
customer_reviews.author: IJONG LIN

customer_reviews.title: Check to make sure all parts are included
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product Saturday. It was delivered on Tuesday, but missing the SIM card. It does little good to have the Hotspot but no SIM card. I had to purchase a SIM card sold separately and now have to wait for that to deliver as well.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Device is good, plans from AT&T are more limited than I would prefer but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Oldaker

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this instead of the pre-paid version because it said "unlocked" and it was $20 cheaper. Unfortunately, it doesn't work with pre-paid, or at least I haven't been able to figure out how to get it set up. Solid product and I'm the idiot so it still gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TopDog

customer_reviews.title: If unlocked, not a good process
customer_reviews.text: Tried to get this activated on Straight Talk as I only needed a cheap connection and would be using this rarely. After 2 hours on the phone with Straight Talk help desk, we were unable to get it connected. Ended up having to go to ATT to get it connected and paid a lot more than I wanted to. Word of warning, will not connect to Straight Talk!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery/ charging ability
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product only 3 stars because the battery and plug is very challenging. You can’t keep it plugged in all of the time because it will still die and sometimes it won’t charge. The WiFi works great, we have a tv upstairs and down that we run off of ps3 and a ps4 and we are able to stream easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half the price of ATT
customer_reviews.text: Great hot spot WiFi used in motorhome and for my pos machine frees up my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Alberta G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product good price
customer_reviews.text: Wireless internet device, fairly easy to use, slower than some newer models but good enough for my needs. Can connect 10 devices with very little lag or slowing. Good product, I bought this to replace the one I had that stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: James Leverett

customer_reviews.title: Good 4G hotspot
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a wifi hotspot like the one i used at work and found it! It is easy to use and works well except battery needs recharged a lot , but so did the work one so i knew that going in. Didnt want 5G so i feel glad i found this 4G one.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - not much better life
customer_reviews.text: It must have a tiny battery, it doesn't seem to last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great with TMobile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with mint mobile( TMobile) to use for blink cameras at my cabin and has worked great, can't comment on battery life as I leave it plugged in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as Advertised. Device is LOCKED to AT&T Network
customer_reviews.text: The seller states repeatedly this is an unlocked device with out sim card. The device i received is locked and contained a SIM card for AT&T. Now i have to hope that i can get AT&T customer support to Unlock the device. DO NOT buy if you plan to use another carriers SIM.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for internet on the go and it is pay as you go
customer_reviews.text: You need to get a sims card for the unit and buy a plan at the AT&T store. I have unlimited data for my streaming at home so now I get free HBO for live! Worth the trip to AT&T. Great for traveling or going to my mom's house she doesnt have internet services she is 82,
customer_reviews.author: Dee B

customer_reviews.title: I think its great but only if you're network is At&T.
customer_reviews.text: My network is t mobile so maybe that's why I couldn't really control the settings And Hotspot name to make it fit me.
customer_reviews.author: William T Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ?? Faulty battery
customer_reviews.text: Original Battery wouldn’t take charge. As instructed by ATT associate, I installed battery from another hotspot. It charged & worked abt 48 hours. Now hotspot won’t come on
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Holder

customer_reviews.title: It dated device sales
customer_reviews.text: Rep at att store says it out if date because it only carries the old big sized sim cards which he said all new devices now only.
customer_reviews.author: Va

customer_reviews.title: Can't change wifi password
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy This device if you don't want throw your money away!!! Data flied in few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product.Had an identical one prior that lasted several years and only failed due to owner error
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rural area, costs to much on plan.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product. Does not work good in a rural area.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gall

customer_reviews.title: Wi-Fi box
customer_reviews.text: They said on site it was unlocked that a lie ,I purchase one to take to Jamaica because I was going to visit because of Covid 19 I am no able to go so I send it there went to get set up was told it’s locked, this is very disappointing to me ,so now it’s no used there.
customer_reviews.author: madge henry

customer_reviews.title: Device associated with FRAUD according to AT&T. Cannot be unlocked.
customer_reviews.text: Device associated with FRAUD according to AT&T. Cannot be unlocked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: It works just as advertised and we have been very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: THE TAYLOR'S

customer_reviews.title: Mobile hotspot device
customer_reviews.text: \I would’ve never bought this had I known that the thing couldn’t be added to my contract of phone service. Itisa pay as you go.i have no use for it so I have lost my money. Never again. Buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Decent item
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. Minor problems with signal strength here and there.
customer_reviews.author: rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Like it’s works good but don’t save connected devices can’t figure that out
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Great for just starting out on hotspots. Easy to use just not as many advanced settings as higher models.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Henson

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have on the road
customer_reviews.text: I’m a traveler and as we know WiFi is not that great in a lot of places but this device allows me to use my phone or iPad without any issues. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Rose Evans

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My first hot spot would not function but Amazon got me a new one in about a day. That is the only reason for four stars. The new one has worked fine for moderate use for just over a month.
customer_reviews.author: BRUCE DAVIDSON

customer_reviews.title: It is not as advertise
customer_reviews.text: Brought 3, only one was unlocked, the other two says sim lock.
customer_reviews.author: Bertrand Fravien

customer_reviews.title: This item is very crappy hotspot is very slow and takes a long time
customer_reviews.text: And takes a long time to receive it by mail Not worth the money streaming is slow
customer_reviews.author: Justin Z.

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies fast.
customer_reviews.text: Everything came on time and easy to use.but it keeps restarting every few hours before it use to just turn off and stay off so I had to turn it back on. Ones I reset it it stops turning of but now it just restarts it self.. other then that everything is working great.
customer_reviews.author: e.marte

customer_reviews.title: Nice range
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use if you already have a chip. Just plug and go.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money
customer_reviews.text: It works really good. It's better than what we got before for more money.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor McArthur

customer_reviews.title: My first bad buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Wifi doesn't work. No matter what I do it just won't connect. To bad. It's too late to return it. Please don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Calibrated for another system like China. Time, date, and wireless network were way off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one issue 🤔
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I had with this product is at different times, the device would turn off. Not sure what would cause it to turn off but while it was on, it worked great. Still satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rowena Wright

customer_reviews.title: It’s not unlocked. misleading offer
customer_reviews.text: it’s not unlocked. I call to AT&T, and they can’t help me. It’s a scam. I lose my money. I send to my country to stay communicate with my family and I can’t, we are very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Try to get a better plan an real unlimited plan
customer_reviews.text: I like the device it self..but just when you activate at&t says it was a unlimited plan they gave me, but couldn't tell cause the data ran out fast. I paid $75.00 at first plus an additional $25.00 when the data ran out and it still ran out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for VOIP!
customer_reviews.text: 9500 ft up in the mountains and it works great! ATT service is better than the DSL internet provided by Wifi. My VOIP calls drop on the Wifi but the hotspot works perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device because it was supposed to be unlocked. As it turns out it's not unlocked. Very disappointed. Would like to have the unlock code or my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Hall

customer_reviews.title: Woks Beautifully in Foreign Countries
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for use while in foreign countries. Was recently in Thailand, Vietnam and Malaysia and bought inexpensive SIM cards in each country and tethered to my iPhone. It worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t charge
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this hotspot I was happy with it, but not two months after having it it’s not working. It will not charge or turn on. Right after the return window closed
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This device is flagged for fraud
customer_reviews.text: ATT flagged this device for fraud. I bought it UNLOCKED
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Avila

customer_reviews.title: Who to call
customer_reviews.text: It's a hassle to set up but finally got a hold of the right people. Haven't had it long enough yet but so far its great.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Average connectivity. Sometimes, it’s difficult to “wake” the device up by touching on the screen. Does what I need it to do otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 3 months of use. Bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rathke

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I have two and they have never failed me, work when my cell phone doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip King

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product Battery life about a full day of continuous usage
customer_reviews.author: carlos h.

customer_reviews.title: Used and broken
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because it was used but I ordered a new one, this one had a broken SIM card reader so it didn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G.

customer_reviews.title: Turning the hotspot for the Nighthawk. I need speed ...
customer_reviews.text: Turning the hotspot for the Nighthawk. I need speed and options. Velocity has low battery life, sleeps and you have to wake up. Intermittent
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: 👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Worked for approximately two hours and quit. Just like the one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works with T-Mobile once unlocked
customer_reviews.text: Product is NOT UNLOCKED, however once the seller contacted - unlocked code was provided and currently able to use the devise.
customer_reviews.author: Hristina Dixon BSN RN

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It's advertised as unlocked, but it's locked and ATT won't unlock it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach L luk

customer_reviews.title: Not unlocked!
customer_reviews.text: This was not unlocked. The box stated that you must use at&t for 6 months before they will unlock it. Not what I was looking for or wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Angela H.

customer_reviews.title: Awful.  Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This piece of junk works only sporadically. It shuts itself down, dead, requiring reboot every few minutes. Total waste of money. Tried software update, HW reset, settings. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: HP B

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use AT&T
customer_reviews.text: Device might be ok but AT&T can’t help you. Over 3 hrs & 2 trips to AT&T store, still can’t activate it
customer_reviews.author: Hands off my funnel cake

customer_reviews.title: Thetering does not work
customer_reviews.text: The Hotspot cannot tether via USB. Windows says it cannot find drivers. Tested on three computers with the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.text: The device is definitely faulty (likely refurbished) and started malfunctioning within 5 months of purchase (battery is fubared)

product_meta.title: ZTE Velocity | Mobile Wifi Hotspot 4G LTE Router MF923 | Up to 150Mbps Download Speed | WiFi Connect Up to 10 Devices | Create A WLAN Anywhere | GSM Unlocked - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThis AT&T Velocity Wi-Fi hotspot allows you to simultaneously connect up to 10 devices to the Internet at 4G LTE speeds. The intuitive touch screen makes navigation and changing settings simple. Rechargeable lithium-ion battery
feature_bullets: DOES THIS DEVICE NEED A SIM CARD: Yes it does Being that this device is GSM unlocked it will work on any GSM Network with a Micro size SIM Card The sim card does not come included, Contact your Network Provider to acquire your complimentary Sim card (Free from most Carriers with activating of an account)

WHAT NETWORK FREQUENCIES ARE SUPPORTED AND CAN BE RECEIVED BY THIS DEVICE: LTE bands 2/4/5/17/29 and UMTS HSPA 850/1900/2100. As well this device can provide WIFI: Dual-Band WiFi (2.4GHz or 5GHz) This variation of bands give it the ability to roam on LTE in many foreign countries, including all of Europe and much of Asia

HOW LONG CAN I EXPECT THE BATTERY TO LAST ME: Well the battery has 2,800mAh which in a Usage time frame means 10 solid hours of streaming at 4G LTE speeds as well it has a Standby time of up to 240 hours before you need to recharge the battery. WHAT CAN I EXPECT OUT OF THE BOX: Well this device has a Single-Core Qualcomm MDM9225 Processor giving it the ability to Connect up to 10 devices simultaneously with Separate Guest WiFi to ensure security as well it will come with a charger and a manual

WHAT DOES UNLOCKED REALLY MEAN: Unlocked devices are compatible with GSM carriers the kinds that Use SIM Cards for Service like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers) Unlocked Devices will not work with CDMA Carriers the kinds that don't use sim cards for service like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin (contact your network provider prior to purchasing for verification that they support GSM frequencies)
